title: New Jersey Pizza Company
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Uses local and organic produce, and is a slow food locally owned establishment. Produce selection is vast for a pizza place, roasted garlic, carmelized onions, and fire roasted tomatoes to name a few. Has vegan cheese and will make both pizzas and calzones with it.
